TextView.android:text: Ram Shrestha, my father, is a devoted farmer who has dedicated his life to nurturing both the land and his family. His days are often spent working tirelessly, but he also finds time to unwind by scrolling through social media—a hobby that keeps him connected with the world. Despite his busy schedule, he has a kind and caring nature, though he can be stern when necessary. This blend of warmth and discipline is part of what makes him so impactful. One of the most valuable lessons he has imparted to me is the importance of valuing time. He always says, “If you don’t value your time, no one will value you.” This lesson has guided me throughout my life, reminding me to make the most of every moment and to understand the true worth of time.
